title: Müller (surname)
text: The German word Müller means "<a href="miller">miller</a>" (as a profession). It is the most common family surname in Germany, Switzerland, and the French départements of <a href="Bas-Rhin">Bas-Rhin</a> and <a href="Moselle">Moselle</a> (with the spelling Müller, <a href="Mueller%20%28surname%29">Mueller</a> or <a href="Muller">Muller</a>) and is the fifth most common surname in Austria (see <a href="List%20of%20most%20common%20surnames%20in%20Europe">List of most common surnames in Europe</a>). Other forms are "Miller" (mainly Southern Germany, Austria and Switzerland) and "Möller" (Northern and Central Germany and The Netherlands). Of the various family coats of arms that exist, many incorporate milling iconography, such as windmills or watermill wheels.
